data.lyric:
[ti:God Whispered Your Name]
[ar:Keith Urban]
[al:God Whispered Your Name]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]God Whispered Your Name - Keith Urban (凯斯.厄本)
[00:12.80]I was so cold and lost
[00:15.94]And nothing seemed to ring true
[00:19.68]I couldn't bear the cross
[00:22.60]For everything I'd been through
[00:26.22]And each day I knew I needed change
[00:32.87]But there was no way no way
[00:38.20]And then God whispered your name
[00:41.51]And that's when everything changed
[00:44.79]And love came out of the rain
[00:47.98]And talk about being saved
[00:51.40]Suddenly I wanna live
[00:54.51]More than I ever did
[00:57.87]I'm never gonna be the same
[01:01.28]When God whispered your name
[01:10.20]I can see the sunshine
[01:13.53]For the first time in a while
[01:16.40]Girl it's like I've been baptized
[01:20.57]By the warmth of your smile mmm
[01:24.17]Well call it fate or faith or call it crazy either way
[01:30.46]It's amazin' amazin' grace
[01:35.74]When God whispered your name
[01:39.04]That's when everything changed
[01:42.36]Love came out of the rain
[01:45.64]Talk about being saved
[01:48.90]Well suddenly I wanna live
[01:52.22]More than I ever did
[01:55.48]I'm never gonna be the same
[01:58.70]When God whispered your name
[02:03.61]It's just what I needed to hear baby
[02:06.91]It couldn't have been more loud and clear
[02:13.45]When God whispered your name
[02:16.92]That's when everything changed
[02:20.14]Love came out of the rain
[02:22.66]Out of the rain
[02:23.55]And talk about being saved
[02:26.33]Oh suddenly I wanna live
[02:29.98]More than I ever did
[02:33.30]I'm never gonna be the same
[02:36.48]When God whispered your name oh yeah
[02:40.92]Hallelujah Hallelujah
[02:47.38]Hallelujah
[02:51.37]Ooh Hallelujah baby
[02:54.15]Hallelujah
[02:54.85]Oh yeah
[02:56.89]Mmm
[02:57.61]Hallelujah
[03:00.59]Hallelujah
[03:01.76]Ooh yeah
[03:02.94]I can see the sunlight shinin' through your pretty eyes baby
[03:07.20]Hallelujah
[03:07.93]Woo mmm
[03:10.46]Hallelujah
[03:10.85]I like a man who leaves time feels like hell
[03:13.81]Hallelujah
[03:16.56]Got my hands up high I got my hands up to the sky
[03:20.41]Hallelujah
[03:22.54]Ooh I'm sayin' thank you
[03:23.92]Hallelujah
[03:26.90]Hallelujah
[03:33.46]Hallelujah Hallelujah
[03:40.05]Hallelujah
data.trans:
[ti:God Whispered Your Name]
[ar:Keith Urban]
[al:God Whispered Your Name]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:12.80]我心灰意冷 迷茫无措
[00:15.94]一切都看起来好不真实
[00:19.68]我已无法承受
[00:22.60]经历过的一切磨难
[00:26.22]每一天 我都知道我需要改变
[00:32.87]但总是做不到
[00:38.20]后来上帝轻轻念出你的名字
[00:41.51]那一刻 一切都变了
[00:44.79]风雨之后 终于感受到了爱的温暖
[00:47.98]谈起被拯救
[00:51.40]突然之间我想好好活着
[00:54.51]这种渴望前所未有的强烈
[00:57.87]我已经彻底改变
[01:01.28]上帝轻轻念出你的名字
[01:10.20]我看到阳光普照
[01:13.53]长久以来 这还是第一回
[01:16.40]姑娘 就好像我接受了洗礼
[01:20.57]沉醉在你温暖的微笑中
[01:24.17]说这是命运也好 信念也罢 甚至可以说难以置信
[01:30.46]这简直是天赐的恩典
[01:35.74]上帝轻轻念出你的名字
[01:39.04]那一刻 一切都变了
[01:42.36]风雨之后 终于感受到了爱的温暖
[01:45.64]谈起被拯救
[01:48.90]突然之间我想好好活着
[01:52.22]这种渴望前所未有的强烈
[01:55.48]我已经彻底改变
[01:58.70]上帝轻轻念出你的名字
[02:03.61]这就是我需要听到的声音 宝贝
[02:06.91]我听得清清楚楚
[02:13.45]上帝轻轻念出你的名字
[02:16.92]那一刻 一切都变了
[02:20.14]风雨之后 终于感受到了爱的温暖
[02:22.66]风雨之后
[02:23.55]谈起被拯救
[02:26.33]突然间我想好好活着
[02:29.98]这种渴望前所未有的强烈
[02:33.30]我已经彻底改变
[02:36.48]上帝轻轻念出你的名字 
[02:40.92]哈利路亚
[02:47.38]哈利路亚
[02:51.37]哈利路亚 宝贝
[02:54.15]哈利路亚
[02:54.85]//
[02:56.89]//
[02:57.61]哈利路亚
[03:00.59]哈利路亚
[03:01.76]//
[03:02.94]我能在你的眼中看到明媚的阳光 宝贝
[03:07.20]哈利路亚
[03:07.93]//
[03:10.46]哈利路亚
[03:10.85]我终于摆脱了那些痛苦的时光
[03:13.81]哈利路亚
[03:16.56]我把双手伸向天空 高高举起
[03:20.41]哈利路亚
[03:22.54]我想说 谢谢你
[03:23.92]哈利路亚
[03:26.90]哈利路亚
[03:33.46]哈利路亚
[03:40.05]哈利路亚
